titles: The regulating of law-suits, evidences, and pleadings an assize-sermon preach't at Carmarthen, March the 16th, 1656 / by William Thomas ...
author: Thomas, William, 1613-1689.
publisher: Sold by Gabriel Bedell and T. Collins ...,
notes: Running title: A caution for the client, the witnesse and the counsellor.
